Competition: With so many mobile apps available, competition is fierce. The app may struggle to stand out among the many similar apps already on the market, making it difficult to attract and retain users.
User acquisition: Acquiring users for a new app can be challenging. The app may struggle to gain traction and attract enough users to make it profitable.
User engagement: Keeping users engaged with the app can be difficult. The app may struggle to provide a compelling user experience that keeps users coming back for more.

Revenue generation: Generating revenue from an app can be challenging, especially for new apps. The app may struggle to find a profitable business model or may not be able to generate enough revenue to cover its costs.
Marketing: Effective marketing is crucial for the success of a mobile app. The app may struggle to reach its target audience or may not be able to generate enough interest among potential users.
